module.name: Route Congestion Messages
module.description: Configures message or congestion tones played when all trunks are busy in a route. Allows different messages for Emergency Routes and Intra-Company Routes
module.changelog: *13.0.2.1* FREEPBX-13620 Default messages reference a non-existent file *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* 13 Visual conformity *2.11.0.2* Add license file *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
